description: Trace Route TTL Data for a single probe.
title: TraceRouteTtlProbeData

uri.description: The URI of the configuration entity

gateway.description: Route gateway for this TTL Probe. This is applicable only if probe_time_in_millis is non zero. No value set means a response was not received for this particular probe.  Skip printing this in traceroute output if it is same  as the last probe. Only probe time needs to be printed then.

probe_time_in_millis.description: Round-trip time for this TTL probe. No value set means a response was not received for this particular probe (asterisk in traceroute output).
